      • getCharForHuffmanCode

        public char getCharForHuffmanCode(java.lang.StringBuilder code)
        decodes Huffman code into chars.
        Parameters:
        code - the Huffman code to decode WARNING: will be modified!
        Returns:
        the next character from the code sequence SIDE EFFECT: all processed Bits will be removed from code
